original: @219a // na mo badzra bhee ra b'a ya /
analyzed: @219a // na mo badzra bhee ra b'a ya /

original: stong nyid las byung nam mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs //
analyzed: stong nyid las byung nam mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs //
translated: Arisen from emptiness, you dwell in the realm of space,

original: 'jam dpal thugs rje khros pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed ni //
analyzed: 'jam dpal thugs rje khros pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed ni //

original: dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor zhing gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
analyzed: dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor zhing gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
translated: Surrounded by the eight charnel grounds, with the expression of the nine moods,

original: khro rgyal dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar la @219b phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: khro rgyal dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar la @219b phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Wrathful king, blazing like the fire at the end of time, I pay homage to you.

original: zhal dgu phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi zhabs bcu drug / mthing nag mi'u thung gzugs can gcer bu ma he'i zhal //
analyzed: zhal dgu phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi zhabs bcu drug / mthing nag mi'u thung gzugs can gcer bu ma he'i zhal //
translated: With nine faces, thirty-four arms, and sixteen legs, dark blue, with the form of a dwarf, a buffalo face,

original: phem dang ha ha hi hi drag po'i sgra dang ldan //
analyzed: phem dang ha ha hi hi drag po'i sgra dang ldan //
translated: Emitting the fierce sounds of pheṃ, ha ha, hi hi,

original: mi 'gyur 'jam dpal bde chan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: mi 'gyur 'jam dpal bde chan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Unchanging Mañjuśrī of bliss, I pay homage and praise you.

original: drag po'i stobs kyis bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad gshin rje'i gshed //
analyzed: drag po'i stobs kyis bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad gshin rje'i gshed //
translated: With fierce power, you conquer the four māras, Yamantaka,

original: grub chen brgyad kyi dbugs 'byin skye mched mchog sbyin mdzes //
analyzed: grub chen brgyad kyi dbugs 'byin skye mched mchog sbyin mdzes //
translated: You grant the supreme sense bases, the inspiration of the eight great accomplishments,

original: sems can re skong las mdzad byams pa thugs rje can //
analyzed: sems can re skong las mdzad byams pa thugs rje can //
translated: Beneficent and compassionate, fulfilling the hopes of each sentient being.

original: zag med pa de rgyas mnyam mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
analyzed: zag med pa de rgyas mnyam mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
translated: To you, who are the equal, supreme, and universal expansion of the undefiled, I pay homage.
